TheSimpletonMod:ChiliCropOrb.NAME: Chilis
DESCRIPTION: #yBurning to ALL enemies for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:CoffeeCropOrb.NAME: Sunflowers
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Gain an Energy for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:CornCropOrb.NAME: Corn
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Draw a card for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:EmptyCropOrb.NAME: Plot
DESCRIPTION: Crops can be planted into these slots.

TheSimpletonMod:MushroomCropOrb.NAME: Mushrooms
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Add a random colorless card to your hand for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:OnionCropOrb.NAME: Onions
DESCRIPTION: #yWeak to a random enemy for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:PotatoCropOrb.NAME: Potatoes
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Add a #ySpud to your hand for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:StrawberryCropOrb.NAME: Strawberries
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Consume ALL stacks and add a #yGnawberry to your hand for each stack harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:TurnipCropOrb.NAME: Turnips
DESCRIPTION: #gHarvest: Convert ALL stacks into an attack card that deals increased damage to all enemies for each stack harvested and adds a #yTurnips card to your discard pile.
